name: SANTA SACKS
description: This drawstring Santa Sack is the perfect size to hang on the end of a bed or cot or use to wrap a selection of gifts. Available in vermillion or emerald, it features the following friendly creatures: robin, moose, owls, penguin and polar bear as well as seasonal graphics and a 'to' label. Each bag comes with a Sharpie fabric marker so you can personalise it and use it year after year. It is hand screen printed on 100% natural cottonseed using water based inks and is washing machine and chewing baby safe. It is 50 by 50 cm with a cord drawstring. Currently available in: Vermillion and Emerald Click on the photos below to see detail and colourways Please note, sacks will be dispatched from 1st December using first class delivery. To receive yours via Special Delivery as Christmas approaches, please email us at info@marthalewisdesign.com for a postage quote.

name: TEA TOWELS
description: These two tea towels in grey and turquoise feature all the favourite animals from our play mats.  They are printed on 100% cotton and have a handy hanging loop in the top right corner.

name: OCHRE PICTURE PLAY MAT
description: These picture play mats feature a combination of eight of the following friendly creatures: lion, crab, fish, rabbit, mouse, cat, spider, frog, ladybird, butterfly, bee, turkey, owl, penguin, monkey and bird. They are hand screen printed on 100% natural cottonseed canvas using water based inks and are washing machine and chewing baby safe. These versatile picture play mats are 50 by 75cm and come with handy ties and a cotton bag to make it easy to take anywhere. • Fasten to a car headrest • Hang in front of a bouncy chair or next to changing mat • Use as a play mat for tummy time • Display on a wall to brighten a room • Fold and lie along the side of the pram or moses basket Also available in turquoise, apple and coral. If you would like to request a specific creature on your mat from the list above, please place your order and then the drop us a note using the 'contact us' form. See our product notes for more information about the design and use of our mats and our testimonials page for photos of them in use.

name: OCHRE BAG
description:
This drawstring bag is the perfect size for toys, books, laundry or anything else that needs tidying or carrying. It looks great at home or out and about.

Available in five different designs featuring friendly creatures kids will love. Lion, ladybird, owl or a mix of four or nine animals.
It is hand screen printed on 100% natural cottonseed using water based inks and is washing machine and chewing baby safe. 

The bag measures 50 by 50 cm with a cord drawstring.
Also available in turquoise.

Click on the photos to see design and detail.

name: OCHRE CUSHIONS
description:
These striking cushions are a great addition to any room.

 Available in five different designs featuring friendly creatures kids will love. Lion, ladybird, owl or a mix of four or nine animals.

The cushions are hand screen printed on 100% natural cottonseed using water based inks with deep brown reverse and are washing machine and chewing baby safe. 

They are 50 by 50 cm with an envelope opening and come with a 100% duck down cushion pad.

Also available turquoise.

Click on the photos to see design and detail.

name: FLASH CARDS
description: ANIMAL FLASH CARDS STARTER PACK The flash cards starter pack is a series of 12 bold and engaging designs featuring the following friendly creatures: duck, bee/ladybird, fish, frog, monkey, spider, owls, crab, lion, penguin, mouse and cat. They are hand screen printed on A5 light-weight board using water based ink and come in a box to keep them safe. Each pack contains 12 designs using a mix of 4 unisex colours: ochre, turquoise, apple and coral. The starter pack comes with a useful hand made wooden stand that holds a card upright. See our product notes for more ideas what to do with them.

name: GREETINGS CARDS
description: GREETINGS CARDS At last! Striking and attractive greetings cards which you will enjoy sending and babies will love to receive. We have ‘happy birthday’ (lion or ladybird), ‘congratulations’ (boy or girls owls) or blank (frog or crab) cards featuring the friendly animal designs. They are hand screen printed A5 postcard format with a recycled white envelope. If you have a colour preference please let us know and we’ll do our best to send it. You can also add a message so that your personalised card is sent with your order. To do this, add a card to your cart and enter your message in the "Add note to Seller" box during checkout in PayPal.
